strings.Value: "Greetings, {mf|Your Grace|Your Grace|Your Highness|Your Highness}! As you know, I was born in Kyonin, the most wonderful land that has ever existed. And yet I must say â€“ living in your country is a pleasure for me. The people here seem to be content. They trust you, and trust me as your court craftsman. It's important to know who one's patron is, and how {mf|he|she} treats {mf|his|her} subjects."

"Good day to you, {mf|Your Grace|Your Grace|Your Highness|Your Highness}! And the day is truly good. I saw so many happy people and skillful entertainers on my way here. The {mf|barony|barony|kingdom|kingdom} is changing before our very eyes!"
"It's a fine thing, to share in the joy and amusement. Look! This is my gift to you, {mf|baron|baroness|King|Queen}!"
